text: 2|200|annane ninnal hajj karm'mam nirvahiccu kalinnal ninnalute pitakkale ninnal prakirtticcirunnat pealeyea atinekkal saktamaya nilayilea allahuve ninnal prakirttikkuka. manusyaril cilar parayum; nannalute raksitave, ihaleakatt nannalkk ni (anugraham) nalkename ennâ€Œ. ennal paraleakatt attarakkarkk oru ohariyum untayirikkunnatalla
